name: Pancioli Majestic Hotel

reviews.title: Not so bad but not so grand
reviews.text: There's a lovely old poster of the Majestic in the foyer from its heyday back in the 60s... it's not quite what you'll get these days. My lovely wife and I stayed here in May for a night and really we've no complaints. Location is great... the hotel overlooks the Santa Maria Novella (we saw nothing but cars in the carpark) and is a quick stroll to the Duomo or the train station.
There's plenty to like about the place... I dunno... The Majestic is just... well... a bit tired.
reviews.title: We are not sure what to say.

likes.liked: — Location not bad near train station
likes.disliked: — A couple of nights were noisy but I think they collect garbage and clean streets at night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had come in from Rome to stay in Florence. The room here was very large but in real need of remodeling and cleaning. We had our 2 teens with us and were given ajoining rooms, it then had a total of 4 baths for 4 people, not bad. Our mattress had a piece of particle board under it ???? not sure what that was about, but really wierd. I told my husband this was probably the place the stars stayed back in the day but not anymore - needs remodeling badly, stained carpets etc. The woodwork was coming off of the baseboard. We did not use the elevator because it took too long to call. I was able to use the internet to check e-mail, but on the last night of our stay they told me it was now 5 euro an hour, I told them I only needed a couple minutes, but an hour was the minimum required. Unfotunatly I do not know the exact price of this hotel because it was booked in a lump sum with all of our trip, but I know that it was more than what we spend in the U.S. for a beautiful place.
reviews.title: Smelly Majestic

reviews.text: The room was booked by a travel agency for a conference that was taking place there so we couldn't choose a different hotel. I was prepared what to expect after reading the reviews on the tripadvisor, but I was hoping not to be so bad as we had to stay there 4 nights. The facade of the building was so ugly and out of character and the smell of urine took as right away. In addition, there were empty bottles of beers in front of the building and some strange guys hanging there!
reviews.title: Nothing Majestic About It!

reviews.text: After doing the check-in a guy grabbed our luggages in an impolite way dragging them in an elevetor and using gestrures he tried to show us to take the other elevetor across the lobby. Another girl who was quite impolite took us to our room eventually!
reviews.title: Rip-Off

reviews.text: the location of this hotel is fantastic. everything else about the majestic hotel was not worth the money. run down rooms with broken window shades, an exposed electric socket, a bed with a matress 4 inches thick supported by a plywood board, and oodles of homeless drinking out front. hotel baglioni was way better and just across the street.
reviews.title: not a four star hotel

reviews.text: I spent 4 days at this hotel at the end of July. I had read all the other reviews before I arrived so I knew what to expect. However, the hotel is not as bad as the worst of the reviews, but certainly not as good as some of the others.
reviews.title: Not as bad as I thought it would be

reviews.text: On the plus side my room was of a good size, had plenty of storage space and a large bathroom.
reviews.title: Check Out!!!

reviews.text: But - there was a lot of mould around the shower, a thick layer of dust on the tissue holder behind the bathroom door and lots of greasy fingerprints over the stainless steel toilet rool holder.

reviews.text: As we entered this hotel, the smell was overpowering. t is hard to say what it was but it was not nice. I did them a huge favour by leaving te front door open!

likes.disliked: — smell of foyer and outside motel, run down, some staff standing waiting for a tip - we are not from USA!!!

reviews.text: The building is old but not a good old. Our room did not have a minibar as it was being repaired. They did move us without any fuss. Room was hot but not allowed to have air con on. We left the windows open for air but the sparrow sized mozzies feasted on us all night and the noise outside was unbearable.
reviews.title: Do NOT stay here
